title: Chroniques de Port-Royal
additional-notes: This is a French publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
The first 9 issues, through 1958, were published under the title 'Societé des Amis de Port-Royal', which is also the name of the society that publishes this journal.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Ken Raining for copyright research on this title.
